### Elect

[![](images/voted.jpg){width="100"}](https://cndy17.github.io/STA9750-2024-FALL/mp03.html)

Analysis of the effect of the US Electoral College on US Presidential elections, comparing different ways that states allocate their Electoral College Votes to determine whether this has any effect on who is elected the President of these United States. Visualizes spatial data, working with official electoral records, and accessing public data repositories, such as those of the US Census Bureau. 

[View Report](https://cndy17.github.io/STA9750-2024-FALL/mp03.html)

### Fiscal Characteristics of Major US Public Transit Systems

[![](images/logo_fta.jpg){width="100"}](https://cndy17.github.io/STA9750-2024-FALL/mp01.html)

An investigation of ridership and the fiscal characteristics of US public transit authorities. In this project, I utilize dplyr operations (mutate, group_by, summarize, select, arrange, rename) in R to produce summary statistics.

[View Report](https://cndy17.github.io/STA9750-2024-FALL/mp01.html)
